title: legendaryracers
author: legendaryracers
content: Qizon Coin emerges as a promising cryptocurrency for investment in 2023. This newly unveiled digital currency is making waves in the realm of crypto by suggesting that cryptocurrencies can play a role in promoting sustainability.Primarily designed as a staking coin, Qizon Coin invites users to invest their funds, which will then be allocated to the research and development of Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Hydrogen-powered vehicles. This innovative approach significantly enhances the potential for substantial returns on investment, rendering Qizon Coin a compelling choice to consider for deploying your diligently earned funds.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: legendaryracers on August 09, 2023, 05:59:59 AMPrimarily designed as a staking coin, Qizon Coin invites users to invest their funds, which will then be allocated to the research and development of Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Hydrogen-powered vehicles. This innovative approach significantly enhances the potential for substantial returns on investment, rendering Qizon Coin a compelling choice to consider for deploying your diligently earned funds.this project is closer to scam or a failed project than being a project that can be invested in. It has a very large supply amount, 3000 M QNC. This number is very large, especially since 45% of the total tokens are for the developer team in one way or another, as the items What is in it, such as software development, admin, research and development, and legal aspects, all belong to the developers, and yet they count it as a separate item.I did not find any research institution cooperating with this cryptocurrency (token) nor did I find details of the developer team as they use artificial intelligence generated images with anonymous names.It's too good to be true or it could be a scam, stay away from it.

comments.author: bitgolden
comments.body: Quote from: legendaryracers on August 09, 2023, 05:59:59 AMQizon Coin emerges as a promising cryptocurrency for investment in 2023. This newly unveiled digital currency is making waves in the realm of crypto by suggesting that cryptocurrencies can play a role in promoting sustainability.Primarily designed as a staking coin, Qizon Coin invites users to invest their funds, which will then be allocated to the research and development of Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Hydrogen-powered vehicles. This innovative approach significantly enhances the potential for substantial returns on investment, rendering Qizon Coin a compelling choice to consider for deploying your diligently earned funds.I really hate it when people ask a question that seems like a genuine question that could peak some interest, you click on the topic to see what people said and to say what you think would be a good one and then you open it and see that it's just a shilling attempt, and a terrible one at that as well.Why do people do this? What's the point of this, not that it will not help you get more investors for doing this, I should know I worked with marketing people all my life, but also it will hurt your chances instead. So what OP is doing, is literally making this project be hated even more, that's not what shilling should be about, shilling should be about getting interest from people and this is not the way to do that.

comments.author: Sebas.tian
comments.body: I don't think there is more income to earn from this new project OP, because many potential projects in the market are developing some signs to their customers to believe that there is a great reward ahead of those that will make a choice to embrace their projects in this season. But the way I'm observing this new project in the crypto market, I think it will take a long years before investors will begin to see small income to achieve from this new project because their teams is not too strong like other potential projects team in the community. I will advice you to invest your money in Ethereum and binance in this bearish season and hold till next year when the price hit higher in the market before you can sell to achieve your incomes from the market.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: I avoid projects that have the word profitable platform and use referral programs to promote their project they use plan QuoteCHOOSE YOUR PLANChoose your plan and deposit your fund. as their business model is very similar to the Ponzi scheme and MLM, and why this project is using cartons as their developers, I know,  they can't show their true identity so they cannot be prosecuted, this is how scammers work.There are a lot of warning signs on this project, people should avoid this.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: My boring but sensible answer is bitcoin but you probably don’t want to hear that do you. There are so many altcoins, it’s like playing roulette. It is possible to make serious money in lessee known alts but you are just as, if not more likely to get REKT.My advice is just buy bitcoin & ethereum & be patient. You may not get rich as you’re not early but your money will safely grow in purchasing power.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: QuoteRe: What are the cryptocurrencies worth investing by 2023?Bitcoin no doubt. If you will go with altcoins, I always say Ethereum because out of all the altcoins out there, Ethereum is the safest to invest though I'm not saying that you can get guaranteed profits by investing into it.Quote from: legendaryracers on August 09, 2023, 05:59:59 AM~3 Billion Supply, developer's pictures are just like AI generated logos. I guess these alone are already red flags (at least for me).You will use our funds so that you can develop EV's? Why we need to invest into your project where in fact, there are many companies who are doing it already, and there might be some who already made some EV's. "Designed to be profitable". This phrase is almost the same as the word "guaranteed", and that word is what most of the scammers are using. What do you mean designed to be profitable? So there's no chance for an investor to lose their investment because it's programmed to be profitable for us investors? It's a red flag if my understanding is right. Can't even spell the word "Panel" correctly. Newbie account, advertising a new project in their thread. I've seen this many times already, and all of them didn't even become successful.

comments.author: tsaroz
comments.body: There are many promising coins to invest and as we are in bottom of a bear trend, any popular coins could yield a x2 profit in a couple of years. If we are hoping for a x10, we would be taking higher risks with newer tokens. But not every random tokens are going to be a hit. There are several things to look for and analyze while trying to find a new coin to invest and however good they are on papers, they should be able to generate huge interest and buzz around them.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: I will bring to you nothing but bitcoin and Ethereum, nothing but this two because these are the leading crypto in the market, Bitcoin is a sure plug to connect to, bring your money to Bitcoin and hold for a year or more than a year to get multiple time profits, Bitcoin was out in the year 2009 from Satoshi Nakamoto and Ethereum was in the year 2013 from a programmer named Vitalik Buterin and in the year 2014 Gavin Wood, Charles Hoskinson, Anthony Di Iorio and Joseph Lubin joined the project and from these year's I mentioned between these two coins there have been positive reports, so just choose the two coin.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Well it doesnt mean its legit since there are platforms that looks promising but in the end they are juat gonna rubbish the funds of the investors. But who knows if this is a gem. You could inspect it thoroughly and check out for some green and red flag and observed how they are worth. Sometimes investing on new project reallt pays off especially if it has potential. But be careful on some money grabs so its only you who could check if its worth a lot.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: I never knew there were still projects going through ICO sales, as in the past ICO projects have likely proven to be scams, and users and investors have been avoiding such sales as there is no guarantee of what could be next after a successful purchase. And their form of sales phase is more than four stages long, and it will take until 2024 before they can finish the sales. Poor social media support, and all of that, the team is AI-generated images with no link to any social media, which can at least verify if they are real or not. The chances of the project being a scam are very high, and I will advise investors to stay away from such projects.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: legendaryracers on August 09, 2023, 05:59:59 AMQizon Coin emerges as a promising cryptocurrency for investment in 2023. This newly unveiled digital currency is making waves in the realm of crypto by suggesting that cryptocurrencies can play a role in promoting sustainability.Primarily designed as a staking coin, Qizon Coin invites users to invest their funds, which will then be allocated to the research and development of Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Hydrogen-powered vehicles. This innovative approach significantly enhances the potential for substantial returns on investment, rendering Qizon Coin a compelling choice to consider for deploying your diligently earned funds.I think the better option is to invest in Bitcoin and Ethereum. Apart from that, you can try out some Layer 1 and Layer 2 coins.Layer 1 Projects: SEI, SUI, AptosLayer 2 Projects: ARB, OP, MNT

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Coming to offer this unclear project is more of a scam than a reality, there are no promising projects like this especially with ICO sales already being shunned by many investors I suspect that this project only wants to raise funds for profit alone not about the project.Do not be tempted by their innovative design, it is clear that it will not provide any benefit and I see the website as a commonplace with previously dead projects, their team is covered with cartoons and there is no social media leading to the profile, and this is a clear indication of a scam.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: legendaryracers on August 09, 2023, 05:59:59 AMQizon Coin emerges as a promising cryptocurrency for investment in 2023. This newly unveiled digital currency is making waves in the realm of crypto by suggesting that cryptocurrencies can play a role in promoting sustainability.Primarily designed as a staking coin, Qizon Coin invites users to invest their funds, which will then be allocated to the research and development of Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Hydrogen-powered vehicles. This innovative approach significantly enhances the potential for substantial returns on investment, rendering Qizon Coin a compelling choice to consider for deploying your diligently earned funds.The title must be "What is cryptocurrency not worth investing by 2023?"I meant your main purpose only to promote your scam token. Qizon coin and what the fak is it? Why don't this shit coin just try to do their own research and introduce their proposal to the some biggest players in the automotive like ducadi, mercedez benz, etc? Your coin was offering something bullshit. I will trust it if your project's proposal gonna be approved by one of biggest players in the automotive. Stop fooling people with your shit. People were not stupid enough. Any project that doesn't related to the crypto has more than 98% probability to turn out to be scam project. I saw that your project has very big chance to be a scam project. Complete your RnD and send your result to the one of big company to whether it's worth to invest on it or not. It doesn't even related to the cryptocurrency.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: There's a right way to promote your coin. You could do it in other places of the altcoin section rather than using a clickbait style. Well, just to answer it, I've had my share of supporting a project in the car industry and it always ends up bad in the long run. Although, I did expect something good about them because the project looks really promising after it end up dead, it became a lesson for me to never help market a project that promotes anything in the vehicle industry.If there are promising altcoins in the market, they are already out there being used, still kicking, and their demand is never-ending.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: legendaryracers on August 09, 2023, 05:59:59 AMQizon Coin emerges as a promising cryptocurrency for investment in 2023. This newly unveiled digital currency is making waves in the realm of crypto by suggesting that cryptocurrencies can play a role in promoting sustainability.Primarily designed as a staking coin, Qizon Coin invites users to invest their funds, which will then be allocated to the research and development of Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Hydrogen-powered vehicles. This innovative approach significantly enhances the potential for substantial returns on investment, rendering Qizon Coin a compelling choice to consider for deploying your diligently earned funds.I have never heard of that coin. But with what I am seeing is that everyone has their own bias in terms of investing in the market. There have been new projects that are mentioned but that doesn't mean that all of them have the potential.At the end, you'll always think of what you're going to invest on this year. Soon, this year is going to end again and you'll never know what's the future of these projects except of course, Bitcoin.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on August 09, 2023, 07:26:30 AMthis project is closer to scam or a failed project than being a project that can be invested in. It has a very large supply amount, 3000 M QNC. This number is very large, especially since 45% of the total tokens are for the developer team in one way or another, as the items What is in it, such as software development, admin, research and development, and legal aspects, all belong to the developers, and yet they count it as a separate item.I did not find any research institution cooperating with this cryptocurrency (token) nor did I find details of the developer team as they use artificial intelligence generated images with anonymous names.It's too good to be true or it could be a scam, stay away from it.And then there's a fact that the whole homepage is down. And someone doing actual ICO these days is either out of touch, ignorant or just scamming people. And my guess would be the latter one. Telegram channel with 13 susbcribers and no activity, yet their pompous plan is use the token to "support the research and development of EV and hydrogen vehicles". Which is at the same time, a decent idea for some real funding organization that is prepared to get results in maybe 10 years.But in this case it gave me a chuckle as they obviously have no idea what they are doing. But no one is preventing of thinking big i guess. But i want to be very clear that if this wasn't clear yet to someone that this is a scam.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: People here are educated in determining whether a new project claiming this and that can just be like that: CLAIMING TO BE. Actually, there is nothing wrong with the concept of this new cryptocurrency but if its promotion is tilted towards more on possible returns then there is more likelihood that it just another soon-to-be scam project. I don't have that details on the people behind this project and the things they can do but I doubt its overall viability. Anyway, good luck to anyone who might bite the offer.

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.created_time: August 16, 2023, 12:43:43 PMLast edit: November 21, 2024, 12:28:36 PM by BabyBandit
comments.body: I would for sure say Solana! Buy it and Stake it. The form of Solana looks very good at my opinion.Doge is okay to, but will not hit so much higher, but Solana will. Atleast I think.- BabyBandit -

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: legendaryracers on August 09, 2023, 05:59:59 AMPrimarily designed as a staking coin, Qizon Coin invites users to invest their funds, which will then be allocated to the research and development of Electric Vehicles (EVs) and Hydrogen-powered vehicles. This innovative approach significantly enhances the potential for substantial returns on investment, rendering Qizon Coin a compelling choice to consider for deploying your diligently earned funds.So the Qizon token is designed primarily for staking purposes? it is tantamount to suicide for the investors, this project is no different from a ponzi scheme under the guise of a crypto project, you only aim to collect market capitalization.I've looked at the website, and on the main page it says that this project also aims to make solar panels and electric cars, so what happens after solar panels and electric cars are made? whether to have it must use the token from this project? and as we know, not all countries support crypto payments, like the country I live in (Indonesia), so I think this project will be very difficult to develop.
